im confused about what this is about?

He's saying all he wants to do in Skyrim is have virtual sex with different species to fulfill some weird fantasy he has. It's fucking weird. It's going to be a great game, and it's not supposed to be about fucking weird stuff like this, but that's what people turn it into.
ignoring the inter-species relations part of this topic. I can't wait for this game to come out. Looks absolutely amazing.

>> Whats this game about? 

>> have virtual sex with different species to fulfill some weird fantasy
This game seems creepy to me now with all that virtual sex talk :|
